titles.title: Honoring Future Business Leaders of America-Phi Beta Lambda.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/9/1999--Introduced. Honors Future Business Leaders of America-Phi Beta Lambda. Supports the efforts being made throughout the Nation to inform and educate the people of the United States regarding FBLA-PBL and its activities.
